div.head: To the christen reder.
div.p:
BEholde here (christen reder) the very lyueng Fountayne / the celestial treasure of goddes {pro}mises / out of which do sprīg most fruitfull cōsolations for the / whā so euer thou wilt resort vnto it in thine aduersyty with a thursty sto make. For here be cōpēdiously gathered togyther / the thynges that parauēture thou mightest seke after in the Bible a gret while. And here thou mayst soone. Fynde wher with thou shalt be able / nat onely to cure thyne own woūdes / but also to re cōfort thy neyghbour beīg fallē ī to any aduersyte. And more ouer to make strōge & incourage ye feblenes of mannes conscience / wt these most delectable scriptures of the gret mercy of god.
